channel.title: Linux Dependencies For Ubuntu Client Users
channel.description:
Ubuntu users require these dependencies in order for the Client to load up properly.
Steps To install openssl - type command >sudo apt install libssl1.0< Then type command >sudo apt -y install libgconf2-4<

item.title: Linux Dependencies For Ubuntu Client Users

@Craig wrote:

Ubuntu users require these dependencies in order for the Client to load up properly.

Steps
To install openssl - type command >sudo apt install libssl1.0<
Then type command >sudo apt -y install libgconf2-4<
